subject: Order# SSN1837
description_text:
I received the box with my pedals but the baseplate parts were missing from the box. 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Jamie Capehart,    The base plate is out of stock in the US warehouse, our next shipment will arrive in the next two days, we will replenish it for you once the goods are in the warehouse, please don't worry.
